topics: Industrial Relations and Human Resource Management
course_title: Managing and Volunteering In the Non-Profit Sector
course_description: This is a course intended to give students a broad overview of the management challenges of the non-profit sector. It is not a detailed management course but rather is aimed at students who will likely relate to non-profits in a variety of ways (on the boards, as volunteers, as fund-raisers, and occasionally as staff).
title: Course Metadata
